BehaviorCombo::BehaviorCombo ( const NiTPointerList< BehaviorPtr > &  behaviors,
const NiTPointerList< float > &  coefficients 
)

A BehaviorCombo is a combination of behaviors. The final desired velocity = Sum (behavior[i]->desiredVel * behavior[i]->Coefficient) Ctor
